availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Crouch (Mercer County, Kentucky, farm hand)

body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, farm hand. Kentucky native. Son of Absalom Crouch and Louisiana Crouch. Married to Tabitha Gibson Crouch in Mercer County on May 1, 1860. Farm hand in Mercer County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Garrard County, Division 1, p. 240A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer County, p. 70.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Mercer County Marriages, Film #000191864.
